An Award-Winning & Globally Recognized Architecture & Design University

NewSchool is an innovative architecture, design, and construction management school located in San Diego, California, that offers a range of degrees for students looking to advance their careers in architecture, construction management, graphic design & interactive media, interior architecture & design, and product design. The
School of Architecture and Construction Management

at NewSchool prepares students for careers in architecture and construction management through a variety of undergraduate and graduate degree programs. NewSchool is proud to be one of the first 14 programs in the United States accepted for participation in the National Council of Architectural Registration Boards (NCARB)
program, which allows students to complete architecture license requirements while earning their graduate degree in architecture.
curriculum prepares students for various design careers including
. Our programs also provide an opportunity for students to study abroad for a unique and diverse global education.

NewSchool’s amazing faculty members play a crucial part in the education of our future architects, designers, and construction managers while earning their degree. Our faculty guide our students toward their degree and inspire the work our alumni accomplish in their careers.

NewSchool is accredited by the WASC Senior College and University Commission (WSCUC). Programmatic accreditation for our architecture programs (B.Arch, M.Arch I, and IPAL) is provided through the National Architectural Accrediting Board (NAAB).

Our Mission is to nurture and inspire design-minded learners. Our Philosophy is rooted in design thinking, and we focus on preparation for practice and project-based learning through our bachelor’s and master’s degree programs.
